data.name: Felix All Around the World: An Animated Classic
data.description: Follow the adventurous journey of Felix, a lovable and curious character, as he travels around the world, encountering various cultures and learning valuable life lessons along the way.

data.name: A Mile in His Shoes
data.description: This inspiring film tells the story of a young man with Asperger's Syndrome who becomes a talented baseball pitcher and learns to overcome personal challenges through the support of his coach and teammates.

data.name: Pororo to the Cookie Castle
data.description: Join Pororo and his friends as they embark on a fun-filled journey to the Cookie Castle, where they face challenges and discover the true meaning of friendship.

data.name: Hercules in New York
data.description: Hercules, the legendary Greek hero, finds himself in modern-day New York City, where he experiences a series of comedic and action-packed adventures.

data.name: Boy
data.description: Set in 1984, this coming-of-age story follows an 11-year-old boy who idolizes his father, only to have his illusions shattered when his father returns home from prison.

data.name: Chasing Ghosts
data.description: After the death of his brother, a young boy starts filming the world around him in search of ghosts, leading to unexpected discoveries about life and grief.

data.name: Hero Quest
data.description: A young boy sets out on an epic adventure to save his kingdom from an evil wizard, learning about bravery and friendship along the way.

data.name: Oddball
data.description: An eccentric chicken farmer trains his mischievous dog, Oddball, to protect a penguin sanctuary from foxes, leading to a series of hilarious and heartwarming events.
